reviews.review: Nice community and fun game, takes alot of skill and teamwork.  Although people just boost to level up their perks.
good game very fun

Ну вообщем играл я в CS GO и посмотрел в библиотеку,а там была распродажа Killing Floor.Ну я значит качнул ее )))мало ли што за игра(по картинкам к игре не очень  понятно было)Захожу вообщем на серв а там месево...МЕСЕВО...Толпа зомби щемят игроков со всего мира.Зашел выбрал 1 класс из всех предложеных, сменил себе вид и начал играть.Наша команда состояла из 6 человек,наша задача - выжить, зомби лезли со всех сторон, я не успевал всех лечить но все же мы выжили до конца. В конце раунда  был виден 1.80 метровый  человек, хотя нет не человек, левая рука у этого дядьки была - вертолетная пушка с тепловизором и самонаводящиеся ракетой, из преса сочилась кровь и выстреливало штото из него, разрывая в клочья любую плоть. Сильный и быстрый здоровый дядька с длинными волосами, в шортах. Кто же это? - Это был ПАТРИАРХ . Появляется в 20-300 метров от игроков и шагом идет к игрокам.Старается убить самонаводящиеся ракетой. При сильном ранений ,падает на одно колено и встает,делается невидимым и уходит с места боя что бы подлечится, потом снова рвется в бой. Атакует как в близи так и на расстоянии с неведимкой и без нее. Ну о чем это я..ах да вообщем появился в кустах и шагает такой к нам и говорит: "Сейчас ты умрешь" стреляя ракетой. Всадил в него 2 обоймы гранатомета м32 а ему хоть бы што...пока перезаряжал,он успел убить 2  одним ударом. Стрельнул снова и он сел на колено  но потом встал, сделался невидимым и убежал. Было принято решение занять оборону в ангаре, заменировав вход, мы стали ждать его. 2 на входе и 2 в конце. Я был в конце и слышал его, он показался у входа и взрывчатка сдетанировала, ранив врага, снайпер лихо выстрельнул с м99 точно ему в голову, раздался рык и голова превратилась в фарш. Ну вот и все и мы уже все голосовали за новую карту)))

The game is severely addicting and no other game is able to inspire the level of teamwork and greed created by Killing Floor. The combat is gratifying and visceral yet fun at all times. The wave system works and there's nothing like spending your hard earned DOSH at the trader between levels or giving it to your teammates to make yourself feel powerful. Can't wait for the sequel.

Now at first you'll no doubt find this game very hard. You've got to learn to accept that this game loves its comedy. It really is made for humor (and shooting zeds). First person shooter that you will actually learn to love as you rank up the classes. You'll lose a few games, probably get a little mad, then you'll win a few games and find it amazing and probably repeat those two steps. You have the KF mode (Just survive the waves) and KFO (Do the objectives) all whilst enjoying the beautiful stereotypical British accent! Keep on killing!

This game is strangely addictive, no matter how many times you die! This game is ok, on a scale 0-5 I have to give it a 3, it could have been a 5 but there are some huge limitations. First of all getting caught on the edge of a fence or a car bumper is just silly. Secondly the designers really need to spend some more time at the gun range because reload time is even more silly and the power of the weapons is way off, for example the .45 automatic can kill zombies with 2 shots, but the Tommy gun takes 5-7 shots...they are the exact same caliber (.45) and the Tommy gun actually produces more energy than the pistol. I do not like how all the weapons essentially are the same power, for example the combat shotgun is great, kills with one round and can fire as fast as you can pull the trigger, but it only has a ammo capacity of 6 rounds so you can only kill six zombies and the reload time is that of a jeriatric circus clown, the Tommy gun holds 50 rounds but because it takes 7+ rounds to kill a zombie you can only kill 5-6 zombies before the dreaded slow reload. So basically because of ammo capacity and silly reload times all the weapons have about the same effectiveness at killing the baddies. Go to the range folks, experience how with a little practice you can reload a lot faster and also learn the true effectiveness of different rounds like the .556, .45, 9mm, .30 cal, etc. I will say that the grenades and melee weapons are spot on and work nicely, just don't get to close  :) All in all a fun addictive game that I'm glad I only spent $5.00 on and not $30 or $40 when it was new. Maybe KF2 will address these obvious and glaringly annoying issues  :) 
P.S. With real world firearms you do not have to operate the charging handle or pistol slide every time you reload the weapon. You only have to do that if you run the weapon dry. This is another factor in the silly slow reload times. Spend some time at the range  :)

Nagyon jó játék, bár kicsit monoton, és DLC vásárlása nélkül ha nem is hamar, de elég korán unalomba fulladhat a játék, hiszen az alapjáték 6 féle fegyvert biztosít, és kb. 4 féle karaktert, ami nem túl sok. Én 5 euróért szereztem be, leárazva, annyit viszont bőven megért! Rengeteg DLC-t lehet hozzá venni, szóval ha kicsit szeretnénk befektetni a játékba, nem fogjuk megbánni, és találunk a fogunkra valót. Ami kicsit csalódás, hogy már nem játszák olyan sokan. Azért így is sokszor találkozhatunk megtelt szerverekkel, de már nem olyan mint régen. Persze a játék kihalásától még 1-2 évig nem kell félni... Összességében ha egy Co-op zombi gyilkolászásra vágysz, és szeretnéd kiereszteni a gőzt, ez a megfelelő játék. Én nagyon várom a Killing Floor 2-t is, mert ha sikerült kiküszöbölni a Killing Floor 1 hibáit (és a videók alapján sikerült) akkor egy nagyon jó játéknak nézünk elébe. Nem fogsz csalódni ha megveszed a Killing Floort, de 19-20 eurót ne adj érte, annyit semmiféleképp sem ér meg, várd ki az akciót, vagy a nagy nyári leárazást, és azért a 3-5 euróért szinte ingyen lesz! Pontozás tekintetében nálam 7/10 ez a játék!

This is probably the best co-op shooter I have ever played. Considering it was made in about two months from a UT2004 mod, it's just ridiculous how great standalone game it actually is. And I feel ashamed for having only ~100 hours inside, as I should have hundreds more. It's worth it! And with KF2 on its way, I'm having the best time killing time (zeds) with this one. 10/10.

Co-op shooter pitting you and your friends against hordes of creatures on an open map. Good weapon and map variety, decent workshop support, but could benefit from more modes / objective missions. Not quite LFD, but fun in its own right.

Full disclosure, I've put maybe 30 hours into this game. The rest of the running time is from when I'd gone on vacation, walked away from my computer, but left it paused on a level by accident. You can take my review as an endorsement, but not my clocked time, LOL.

I have a lot of good memories with this game. My first time playing Killing Floor was amazing, me and a friend were living off guest passes just to play this game. One of my favorite things about Killing Floor is how intense it could get at times. You need teamwork to be able to accomplish a victory in this game which I like a lot... but playing with random people can sometimes be frustrating (or you can play single player.... but goodluck.. you will probably need it). This game has a wide range of zombies to fight, from screaming zombie ladies to rocket launcher shooting manly men..... so be prepared.

However after 80 hours of playing, I find it does get boring. This game doesnt seem to be as fun to play by myself compared to playing with friends.... Or maybe im just bad and need my friends to carry me to a victory

I do recommend Killing Floor because it's a fun fps horror game, However it will be more enjoyable if you have some friends to play with who share your interest in killing zombies.

best shooter evah! xoxoxooxoxox

Killing Floor is a fantastic game that lives up to the theme of surviving against zombies. There are plenty of games that take this approach, but this game makes you feel very accomplished due to the quick kills you are able to land on the zombie's (and their heads).

This game has plenty of maps for you to play on, plenty of classes to keep you occupied, and with that an amazing arsenal of weapons that keep you in apocolypse mode for a long time. Also there are so many achievments and workshop items that will just add to the experience that Killing Floor provides for you. 

What makes this game even better, the co-op. Playing with your friends and with people online is a blast, but for practice there is a solo mode where you have access to everything in game. Also the Z.E.D. mode is a when time move slowly due to a headshot on a zombie and this makes the experience much more thrilling.

Lastly, this game is owned by so many people and that should say a lot about this game in the end. I highly recommend this game to any gamer.

Tripwire truly produces fun games, this one is no exception. The Z.E.D. time combined with gorey action of zombie slaughter and teammate awareness makes this the a great zombie survival style game, even though they arent zombies, i use it for convenience. The "test subjects" (zombies) show intelligent A.I. aswell for its time. AN overall fun and action packed experience combined with what i feel to be an arpopriate genre of music subliminally playing in the background of your personal slaughtering grounds.

Ce jeu est assez addictif en coopération ou en solo.

Le recommande ce jeu car celui-ci est bien pensé avec le côté "classes" qui permet d'avoir des gameplays différents entre chaque partie (et même entre chaque manche).

Malheureusement il reste de nombreux bugs. Par exemple la progression ne fonctionne pas toujours et cela est très énervant !!!! (surtout quand vous augmentez de ~5-10% votre "Perk" par partie)

La suite va apparemment bientôt sortir, je vais certainement me l'acheter.

Yes, it's a Left 4 Dead clone, but it's still fun. 
6 types of classes to keep you occupied, slow-motion head-popin' headshots, and of course welding the doors by your teammates right in front of your nose, just for lulz :B
The game is pretty balanced, and could be challenging. You can work alongside with your team, or wander around the map all by yourself and still have fun both ways. 
Slash the zombies with a machine guns, or practice your skill in accuracy by aiming at their heads, heal, set timer bombs, explode, BURN!!, and cut them with a katana - choose your perk and have a lot of fun.

Neben Payday2 ist KillingFloor in meinen Augen so ziemlich das spaßigste Coop-(Survival) Spiel das ich kenne. Es zeichnet sich besonders für die echt coolen Gore Animationen aus d.h. es ist sehr brutal & blutig. Außerdem basiert das Spiel auf Runden-Überleben und Teamwork. Die Gegnerzahl wächst bei jeder überlebten Runde/Welle. Man kann auch anders Spielen indem man einen gemoddeten Server betretet, sind aber meines Erachtens immer voll.

Zum Abschluss gibts immer in der letzten Welle einen "Bossfight" indem der sogenannte (fette) Patriarch -puff zack- vor einem Spieler erscheint und den meistens instant zerfleischt, er verfügt über eine Minigun, einen zerfetzten Arm und so ein komisches Riesenteil das aus seinem Bauch rausragt und Spielern direkt ins Gesicht boxt. Nebenbei schreit er immer das er euch alle Umbringen wird und noch so'n paar Laute wie "BADEGUBAI" bevor er seine Minigun startet.. xD

Die Waffenauswahl könnte etwas größer sein aber ist nicht weiter schlimm.. Ich glaube das Killing Floor 2 um einiges brutaler & noch besser sein wird als sein Vorgänger, sicherlich wird die KF community ebenfalls nach Release des 2er's wachsen.
